changelog.new_features:
- [All tiers] Workspace switching on MacOS
- [All tiers] Spam clicking for increased activity
- [Pro] Variable Low, Medium and High Activity randomization
- [Pro] Integrated Developer Environment (IDE) interaction through 'Browser Interaction' feature toggle
changelog.improvements:
- Set default key to right arrow key
- Minor UI Improvements
- Add better randomization option to keyboard movement
- Fix Hubstaff detection
